thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text: I spent many hours learning my way around using Onesim, as some things were confusing. It paid off by doing my test call in one try and a feeling of comfort with using the service. It is not exactly "plug and play", but not impossible. I would be very happy if you would apply the cost of the extra PEN and a years worth of service that I ordered by accident, to my account. That was one place that was confusing.
